    • Method Detail

      • readInListFromSeveralFiles

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readInListFromSeveralFiles(java.lang.String directory,
                                                               java.lang.String splitter,
                                                               int numberOfLines)
        Reads text from files in a directory and stores the data in a ArrayList. The start and end of one entry in the ArrayList is determined by a variable
        Parameters:
        directory - the input directory
        splitter - the variable after which the text is split. set to "\n" if the entries in the ArrayList should correspond to lines in the input file
        numberOfLines - the number of lines which should be read. set to 0 to read the whole file
        Returns:
        a ArrayList that holds the data of the file

      • readInList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readInList(java.lang.String file,
                                               java.lang.String splitter,
                                               int numberOfLines)
        Reads text from a file and stores the data in a ArrayList. The start and end of one entry in the ArrayList is determined by a variable
        Parameters:
        file - the input file
        splitter - the variable after which the text is split. set to "\n" if the entries in the ArrayList should correspond to lines in the input file
        numberOfLines - the number of lines which should be read. set to 0 to read the whole file
        Returns:
        a ArrayList that holds the data of the file

      • readConfigFile

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readConfigFile(java.lang.String file)
        Reads line-wise from a file containing a configuration for the word alignment algorithm
        Parameters:
        file - the configuration file
        Returns:
        a HashMap that holds the configuration keys as keys and the values as values

      • readVocabulary

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readVocabulary(java.lang.String file)
        Reads line-wise from a file containing a configuration for the word alignment algorithm
        Parameters:
        file - the configuration file
        Returns:
        a HashMap that holds the configuration keys as keys and the values as values
